item.description:
Andrea and Mike have been kind enough to open up their home for a cookout and exciting viewing of the US World Cup opening game.

What to Bring: Andrea and Mike will provide the food. If guests can indicate when they sign up if they will be bringing sides or drinks that will be helpful.

There are only fifteen open spots so it will be first come first serve on the RSVPs. Please RSVP only if you plan to attend. Prior to the event their address will be sent to all yes RSVPs.

Thanks. See you then.
item.name: US World Cup Opener Cookout
